text: This Merry Planet () is a 1973 Soviet science fiction movie directed by Yuri Saakov and Yuri Tsvetkov.Эта веселая планетаЭТА ВЕСЁЛАЯ ПЛАНЕТА (1973) It stars Viktor Sergachyov, Leonid Kuravlyov, and Yekaterina Vasilyeva. ==Actors== *Viktor Sergachyov — X, the commander of the spaceship aliens *Leonid Kuravlyov — Y, a crew member of the alien ship *Yekaterina Vasilyeva — Z, alien woman, crew member of the alien ship *Savely Kramarov — Prokhor, "perpetuum mobile" *Natalya Krachkovskaya — "Butterfly" *Vladimir Nosik — Valerik, "Stargazer" *Yelena Maksimova — Prokhor's mother *Larisa Barabanova — "Little Red Riding Hood" *Alexander Vokach — Pal Palych, elderly animator == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1973 science fiction movies Category:Soviet science fiction movies
title: This Merry Planet
